SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
JavaFX Application class
BaseScene
A Base Scene used in the game.
BlockClickedListener
The Block Clicked listener is used to handle the event when a block in a GameBoard is clicked.
ChallengeScene
The Single Player challenge scene.
CommunicationsListener
The Communications Listener is used for listening to messages received by the communicator.
Communicator
Uses web sockets to talk to a web socket server and relays communication to attached listeners YOU DO NOT NEED TO WORRY ABOUT THIS CLASS! Leave it be :-)
Game
The Game class handles the main logic, state and properties of the TetrECS game.
GameBlock
The Visual User Interface component representing a single block in the grid.
GameBlockCoordinate
Represents a row and column representation of a block in the grid.
GameBoard
A GameBoard is a visual component to represent the visual GameBoard.
GameLoopListener
GameLoopListener listens to the time allocated for a piece to be placed before a life is lost
GameOverListener
GameOverListener listens to when lives remaining is below zero
GamePane
The Game Pane is a special pane which will scale anything inside it to the screen and maintain the aspect ratio.
GamePiece
Instances of GamePiece Represents the model of a specific Game Piece with its block makeup.
GameWindow
The GameWindow is the single window for the game where everything takes place.
Grid
The Grid is a model which holds the state of a game board.
InstructionScene
This class is responsible for displaying the instructions of how to play TetrECS Explains the aim of the game, what controls need to be used and dynamically displays all the game pieces
Launcher
This Launcher class is used to allow the game to be built into a shaded jar file which then loads JavaFX.
Leaderboard
VBox to show players and their scores during a multiplayer game
LineClearedListener
LineClearedListener listens to when a line is cleared
LobbyScene
Lobby Scene is the scene where users are able to host or join multiplayer games
MenuScene
The main menu of the game.
MultiplayerGame
MultiplayerGame holds the logic for a multiplayer game Extends Game class because the main logic is the same
MultiplayerScene
The Multiplayer game scene.
NextPieceListener
NextPieceListener listens to when the next piece has been generated so that Pieceboards can be updated
PieceBoard
GameBoards for current and incoming pieces
ScoreScene
Scores scene.
ScoresList
To show the scores in the score scene
